channel.title: grammatica on Rusland 1
channel.description: Recent content in grammatica on Rusland 1

item.title: First and Second Conjugation
item.description: It is useful – and inevitable – to learn these conjugations. The same patterns recur frequently. Learn Russian Verbs The series Глаголы (verbs) from LearnRussian.org teaches you verbs in a manageable set of five at a time. Conjugations and applications in sentences, along with short stories and the voice of Anastacia.
